channel.title: How secure is to use Debian installed on Virtualbox with Whonix Gateway?
channel.description: If i have Debian 9 installed on Virtualbox and set to work with Whonix Gateway, and i install Tor browser how secure is to browse internet and connect through ssh to remote servers in comparison of using Whonix Workstation?

item.title: How secure is to use Debian installed on Virtualbox with Whonix Gateway?
item.dc:creator: Simon707
item.description:
Whonix 14 is not officially supported yet.

How to use Tor browser then with Debian on Virtualbox?
